name: Slurpy [C64]
description:
17+

This is a game made with RPG Maker VX Ace!

Before we begin, this is a game I made for fun. I labeled it 17+ because it has a lot of inappropriate language and swear words in it. 

I made this game for myself and anyone who wants to play it ig. It is not finished.

Also I would like to credit Amysaurus on rpgmakerweb.com for a baby sprite I used and whtdragon on the same website for some underwater tilesets I used, and here is credit and @'s for a Time Fantasy Atlantis Tileset I used:

-------------------------

 timefantasy.net

-------------------------

 finalbossblues.com

finalbossblues

Patreon

 patreon.com/finalbossblues

-------------------------

Your name is Lake! He is a gender-fluid baddie and goes by all pronouns. Basically they were camping out one day and then woke up on the cold hard ground. 

Choose a class between Witch (the best) or Spellblade (The worst). The Spellblade also probably makes it harder to fight, I've just found that it does when I use that class for testing purposes.

You go around just exploring(maybe??) and doing simple quests all while being called a slurpy white-water.

I'm not 100% sure on if I can put sus words in the title so I'm calling it white-water.

------------------------

Also the music is like not the best, so just play your own if you are picky. 

And try to avoid fighting monsters without a weapon!!!

To end things, you can really see from the beginning to end where I have sort of improved building things, or just used a template and changed it up a bit.
